1.0.name: wordpress/dhresume
1.0.description:
DhResume can provide a directory service of resume coded in hResume microformat in your WordPress blog. Just give the URL of the XML-RPC service to users, then they can publish the CV in microformat hResume directory. The directory provided a search engine and index display.

The administration can delete, update or add a resume coded in hResume microformat. DhResume is compatible with LinkedIn

To publish a resume in the directory, you need to have a resume in hResume microformat. Use the plugin My-hResume and add the URL of service in the end of the form.
